summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models.
